step.instructions:
Add Dataset to Linklist

Use this workflow to add a dataset to your Linklist Concatenation.
This workflow requires:
  • Target Dataset Name
  • Target Linklist Name
  • Target Location in Linklist
  • After Dataset if Target Location is AFTER


If you have any questions please reach out to Eduardo Rocha:
Eduardo Rocha @IBM
Eduardo Rocha @LinkedIn

template.inlineTemplate:
/*REXX*/ adsn='${adsn}' tdsn='${tdsn}' tlink='${tlink}' tloc='${tloc}' /*---------------------------------------------------------------- - Display Current Linklist - Define new linklist - Exit if target linklist is eq current ----------------------------------------------------------------*/ call syscmd "d prog,lnklst" clink=word(line.2,3) if clink <> tlink then call syscmd "setprog lnklst,define,name="||tlink||",copyfrom="||clink else do say " !! Could not define "||tlink||" !!" exit 8 end /*---------------------------------------------------------------- - Add Dataset to the New Linklist - Exit if Define Failed ----------------------------------------------------------------*/ if word(line.1,1) = 'CSV500I' then do if loc <> 'AFTER' then call syscmd "setprog lnklst,add,name="||tlink, ||",dsname="||tdsn||","||tloc else call syscmd "setprog lnklst,add,name="||tlink, ||",dsname="||tdsn||","||tloc"="||adsn end else do say " !! Could not add Dataset "||tdsn||" !!" call syscmd "setprog lnklst,undefine,name="||tlink exit 8 end /*---------------------------------------------------------------- - Activate the New Linklist - Exit if Add Dataset Failed ----------------------------------------------------------------*/ if word(line.1,1) = 'CSV501I' then do call syscmd "setprog lnklst,activate,name="||tlink end else do say " !! Could not Activate Linklist "||tlink||" !!" call syscmd "setprog lnklst,undefine,name="||tlink exit 8 end /*---------------------------------------------------------------- - Update all Jobs using Linklist - Exit if Activate Failed ----------------------------------------------------------------*/ if word(line.1,1) = 'CSV500I' then do call syscmd "setprog lnklst,update,job=*" end else do say " !! Could not Update Job=* !!" exit 8 end
say "WKFLNK01 - Completed Successful"
exit
syscmd: /*---------------------------------------------------------------- - Issue an MVS System Command ----------------------------------------------------------------*/ parse arg cmd x=msg('off') 'CONSOLE DEACTIVATE' x=msg('off') 'CONSOLE NAME('SYSVAR(SYSUID)||'@) ACTIVATE' 'CONSOLE SYSCMD('cmd')' msgs = GETMSG('line.','SOL',,,10) 'CONSOLE DEACTIVATE' return
